plain: Based on the user's favorite movies, it can be inferred that their favorite genre is probably thriller/horror, as many of their favorite movies fall into those categories. They seem to prefer complex, twist-filled plots, as many of their favorite movies have unexpected turns. Their favorite musical scores are likely to be dark and ominous, with a mood that matches the tone of the movie. The setting of their favorite movies is likely to be urban or wilderness, as many of the movies take place in those locations. Their favorite visual style is probably dark and gritty, with a focus on realism. Their favorite writing style is probably complex and detailed, with a focus on character development. Their favorite runtime is probably around 2 hours, as many of their favorite movies are that length. Their favorite themes are probably crime/detective, as many of their favorite movies deal with those topics.
